scripts.install:all: concurrently "npm --prefix "./packages/PageLayout" install"  "npm --prefix "./packages/AdminPage" install" "npm --prefix "./packages/HomePage" install" "npm --prefix "./packages/ContestsPage" install" "npm --prefix "./packages/DiaryPage" install" "npm --prefix "./packages/ScheduleEditPage" install" "npm --prefix "./packages/SchedulePage" install" "npm --prefix "./packages/SignInPage" install" "npm --prefix "./packages/SignUpPage" install" "npm --prefix "./packages/StudentPage" install"
scripts.build:all: concurrently "npm run --prefix "./packages/PageLayout" build"  "npm run --prefix "./packages/AdminPage" build" "npm run --prefix "./packages/HomePage" build" "npm run --prefix "./packages/ContestsPage" build" "npm run --prefix "./packages/DiaryPage" build" "npm run --prefix "./packages/ScheduleEditPage" build" "npm run --prefix "./packages/SchedulePage" build" "npm run --prefix "./packages/SignInPage" build" "npm run --prefix "./packages/SignUpPage" build" "npm run --prefix "./packages/StudentPage" build"
scripts.preview:all: concurrently "npm run --prefix "./packages/PageLayout" preview"  "npm run --prefix "./packages/AdminPage" preview" "npm run --prefix "./packages/HomePage" preview" "npm run --prefix "./packages/ContestsPage" preview" "npm run --prefix "./packages/DiaryPage" preview" "npm run --prefix "./packages/ScheduleEditPage" preview" "npm run --prefix "./packages/SchedulePage" preview" "npm run --prefix "./packages/SignInPage" preview" "npm run --prefix "./packages/SignUpPage" preview" "npm run --prefix "./packages/StudentPage" preview"
